summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2006 ROADMASTER CAMPMASTER.  THE VEHICLE HAS TITAN TIRES, SIZE SP/225/75/R15 (NA).  WHILE INSPECTING THE TIRES, THE CONTACT NOTICED THAT THE REAR DRIVER'S SIDE TREAD SEPARATED.  THE TIRE WAS REPLACED.  WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 55 MPH, THE FRONT DRIVER'S SIDE TIRE BLEW OUT WITHOUT WARNING.  ALL OF THE TIRES WERE REPLACED.  PRIOR TO TRAVELING, THE CONTACT INSPECTED THE TIRES AND NOTICED THAT THE TIRE PRESSURE WAS NORMAL.  HE CALLED THE MANUFACTURER AND IS WAITING FOR A RESPONSE.  THE CONTACT STILL HAS POSSESSION OF THE TIRES.  THE FAILURE AND CURRENT MILEAGES WERE 1,000.
